
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">自测 <br>7点开始-浦发信用卡 <br>瑞幸咖啡小程序-我的-礼品卡-定制新礼品卡-任选一个图案-下一步-顶部选择[现金卡]，输入自定义面额，微信浦发信用卡立减 <br>面额40-12.6=27.4 <br>面额20-6.6=13.4 <br>面额10-3.6=6.4 <br><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007msYyzgy1hxs1qllkbmj30wy0u0gmf.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx4.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/007msYyzgy1hxs1qllkbmj30wy0u0gmf.jpg" class="qr-image"></div><p></p>
